name: Hextraterrestrials
description:
Hextraterrestrials is a fast-paced match 3 shooter. It takes inspiration from Space Invaders and utilizes the concept of basic match 3 mechanics to create an exciting and action packed game. Defend Earth from alien invaders by destroying their turrets as they fire back down at you.

Music Credits:

Eyes on You (Sting) by Network 415 (youtube.com/audiolibrary/music)
